The user still takes normal damage from weather and status effects while behind its substitute. If the substitute breaks during a multi-hit attack, the user will take damage from any remaining hits. If a substitute is created while the user is trapped by a binding move, the binding effect ends immediately. Fails if the user does not have enough HP remaining to create a substitute without fainting, or if it already has a substitute.

name: Surf
description: Damage doubles if the target is using Dive.
shortDescription: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Double damage on Dive.

name: Sweet Kiss
description: Causes the target to become confused.
shortDescription: Causes the target to become confused.

name: Sweet Scent
description: Lowers the target's evasiveness by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Lowers the foe(s) evasiveness by 1.

name: Switcheroo
description: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail, if neither is holding an item, or if the user is trying to give or take a Griseous Orb, a Plate, or a Drive to or from a Giratina, an Arceus, or a Genesect, respectively. The target is immune to this move if it has the Sticky Hold Ability.

name: Swords Dance
description: Raises the user's Attack by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Raises the user's Attack by 2.

name: Synchronoise
description: The target is immune if it does not share a type with the user.
shortDescription: Hits adjacent Pokemon sharing the user's type.

name: Synthesis
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded half down.

name: Tailwind
description: For 4 turns, the user and its party members have their Speed doubled. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
shortDescription: For 4 turns, allies' Speed is doubled.

name: Taunt
description: Prevents the target from using non-damaging moves for its next three turns.

name: Techno Blast
description: This move's type depends on the user's held Drive.
shortDescription: Type varies based on the held Drive.

name: Telekinesis
description: For 3 turns, the target cannot avoid any attacks made against it, other than OHKO moves, as long as it remains active. During the effect, the target is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain, Smack Down, and Iron Ball override this move if the target is under any of their effects. Fails if the target is already under this effect or the effects of Ingrain or Smack Down. The target is immune to this move on use if its species is Diglett or Dugtrio.

name: Thief
description: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail, or if the target is a Giratina holding a Griseous Orb, an Arceus holding a Plate, or a Genesect holding a Drive. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle or the Harvest Ability.

name: Thunder
description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop. If the weather is Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%.

name: Thunderbolt
description: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to paralyze the target.

name: Toxic
description: Badly poisons the target.
shortDescription: Badly poisons the target.

name: Toxic Spikes
description: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, poisoning each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to two times before failing. Opposing Pokemon become poisoned with one layer and badly poisoned with two layers. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin successfully, is hit by Defog, or a grounded Poison-type Pokemon switches in. Safeguard prevents the opposing party from being poisoned on switch-in, but a substitute does not.

name: Trick
description: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail, if neither is holding an item, or if the user is trying to give or take a Griseous Orb, a Plate, or a Drive to or from a Giratina, an Arceus, or a Genesect, respectively. The target is immune to this move if it has the Sticky Hold Ability.

name: Vine Whip
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Wake-Up Slap
description: Power doubles if the target is asleep. If the user has not fainted, the target wakes up.
shortDescription: Power doubles if target is asleep, and wakes it.

name: Water Pledge
description: If one of the user's allies chose to use Fire Pledge or Grass Pledge this turn and has not moved yet, it takes its turn immediately after the user and the user's move does nothing. If combined with Fire Pledge, the ally uses Water Pledge with 150 power and a rainbow appears on the user's side for 4 turns, which doubles secondary effect chances and stacks with the Serene Grace Ability, except effects that cause flinching can only have their chance doubled once. If combined with Grass Pledge, the ally uses Grass Pledge with 150 power and a swamp appears on the target's side for 4 turns, which quarters the Speed of each Pokemon on that side. When used as a combined move, this move gains STAB no matter what the user's type is. This move does not consume the user's Water Gem, and cannot be redirected by the Storm Drain Ability.
shortDescription: Use with Grass or Fire Pledge for added effect.

name: Water Sport
description: While the user is active, all Fire-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power multiplied by 0.33. Fails if this effect is already active for any Pokemon.
shortDescription: Weakens Fire-type attacks to 1/3 their power.

name: Weather Ball
description: Power doubles if a weather condition is active, and this move's type changes to match. Ice type during Hail, Water type during Rain Dance, Rock type during Sandstorm, and Fire type during Sunny Day.

name: Whirlpool
description: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP (1/8 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.

name: Whirlwind
description: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, or if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability.
shortDescription: Forces the target to switch to a random ally.

name: Wide Guard
description: The user and its party members are protected from damaging attacks made by other Pokemon, including allies, during this turn that target all adjacent foes or all adjacent Pokemon. This attack has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and doubles each time this move is successfully used. X resets to 1 if this attack fails or if the user's last used move is not Detect, Endure, Protect, Quick Guard, or Wide Guard. If X is 256 or more, this move has a 1/(2^32) chance of being successful. Fails if the user moves last this turn or if this move is already in effect for the user's side.

name: Will-O-Wisp
description: Burns the target.
shortDescription: Burns the target.

name: Worry Seed
description: Causes the target's Ability to become Insomnia. Fails if the target's Ability is Insomnia, Multitype, or Truant.

name: Wrap
description: Prevents the target from switching for four or five turns (seven turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP (1/8 if the user is holding Binding Band), rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass, U-turn, or Volt Switch. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.

name: Absorb
description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded down.

name: Acupressure
description: Raises a random stat by 2 stages as long as the stat is not already at stage 6. The user can choose to use this move on itself or an ally. Fails if no stat stage can be raised or if the user or ally has a substitute.

name: Arm Thrust
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.

name: Assist
description: A random move among those known by the user's party members is selected for use. Does not select Assist, Chatter, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Protect, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Struggle, Switcheroo, Thief, or Trick.

name: Assurance
description: Power doubles if the target has already taken damage this turn.

name: Avalanche
description: Power doubles if the user was hit by a Pokemon in the target's position this turn.

name: Barrage
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.

name: Beat Up
description: Deals typeless damage. Hits one time for the user and one time for each unfainted Pokemon without a non-volatile status condition in the user's party. For each hit, the damage formula uses the participating Pokemon's base Attack as the Attack stat, the target's base Defense as the Defense stat, and ignores stat stages and other effects that modify Attack or Defense; each hit is considered to come from the user.

name: Bide
description: The user spends two turns locked into this move and then, on the second turn after using this move, the user attacks the last Pokemon that hit it, inflicting double the damage in HP it lost to attacks during the two turns. If the last Pokemon that hit it is no longer active, the user attacks a random opposing Pokemon instead. If the user is prevented from moving during this move's use, the effect ends. This move does not check accuracy and ignores type immunity.

name: Bind
description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns (always five turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass or U-turn. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 2-5 turns.

name: Block
description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass or U-turn. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field, unless it uses Baton Pass, in which case the target will remain trapped.

name: Bonemerang
description: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.

name: Bone Rush
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.

name: Bounce
description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Sky Uppercut, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

name: Brave Bird
description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/3 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Has 1/3 recoil.

name: Brick Break
description: If this attack does not miss and whether or not the target is immune, the effects of Reflect and Light Screen end for the target's side of the field before damage is calculated.
shortDescription: Destroys screens, even if the target is immune.

name: Bug Bite
description: The user steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately, gaining its effects unless the user's item is being ignored. Items lost to this move can be regained with Recycle.

name: Bullet Seed
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.

name: Camouflage
description: The user's type changes based on the battle terrain. Normal type on the regular Wi-Fi terrain. Fails if the user has the Multitype Ability or if the type is one of the user's current types.
shortDescription: Changes user's type based on terrain. (Normal)

name: Chatter
description: Has an X% chance to confuse the target, where X is 0 unless the user is a Chatot that hasn't Transformed. If the user is a Chatot, X is 1, 11, or 31 depending on the volume of Chatot's recorded cry, if any; 1 for no recording or low volume, 11 for medium volume, and 31 for high volume.
shortDescription: For Chatot, 31% chance to confuse the target.

name: Clamp
description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns (always five turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass or U-turn. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 2-5 turns.

name: Comet Punch
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.

name: Conversion
description: The user's type changes to match the original type of one of its known moves besides this move and Curse, at random, but not either of its current types. Fails if the user cannot change its type, or if this move would only be able to select one of the user's current types.

name: Conversion 2
description: The user's type changes to match a type that resists or is immune to the type of the last move used against the user, if it was successful against the user, but not either of its current types. The determined type of the move is used rather than the original type. Fails if the last move used against the user was not successful, if the user has the Multitype Ability, or if this move would only be able to select one of the user's current types.
shortDescription: User's type changes to resist last move against it.

name: Copycat
description: The user uses the last move used by any Pokemon, including itself. Fails if no move has been used, or if the last move used was Assist, Chatter, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Protect, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Struggle, Switcheroo, Thief, or Trick.

name: Cotton Spore
description: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's Speed by 2.

name: Counter
description: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical attack this turn, or if the user did not lose HP from the attack.

name: Covet
description: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail or Griseous Orb, or if the target has the Multitype Ability. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle.

name: Crabhammer
description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
shortDescription: High critical hit ratio.

name: Crush Grip
description: Power is equal to 120 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP) + 1, rounded down.

name: Curse
description: If the user is not a Ghost type, lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. If the user is a Ghost type, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down and even if it would cause fainting, in exchange for the target losing 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn while it is active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if there is no target or if the target is already affected or has a substitute.

name: Detect
description: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and doubles each time this move is successfully used, up to a maximum of 8. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, or Protect. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

name: Dig
description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Earthquake and Magnitude, which have doubled power when used against it, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

name: Disable
description: For 4 to 7 turns, the target's last move used becomes disabled. Fails if one of the target's moves is already disabled, if the target has not made a move, if the target no longer knows the move, or if the move has 0 PP.
shortDescription: For 4-7 turns, disables the target's last move.

name: Dive
description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Surf and Whirlpool, which have doubled power when used against it, and is also unaffected by weather. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

name: Doom Desire
description: Deals typeless damage that cannot be a critical hit two turns after this move is used. Damage is calculated against the target on use, and at the end of the final turn that damage is dealt to the Pokemon at the position the original target had at the time. Fails if this move or Future Sight is already in effect for the target's position.

name: Double-Edge
description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/3 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Has 1/3 recoil.

name: Double Hit
description: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.

name: Double Kick
description: Hits twice. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.

name: Double Slap
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.

name: Drain Punch
description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded down.

name: Dream Eater
description: The target is unaffected by this move unless it is asleep and does not have a substitute. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded down.

name: Earthquake
description: Power doubles if the target is using Dig.
shortDescription: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Power doubles on Dig.

name: Encore
description: For 4 to 8 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used. If the affected move runs out of PP, the effect ends. Fails if the target is already under this effect, if it has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if the move is Encore, Mimic, Mirror Move, Sketch, Struggle, or Transform.
shortDescription: The target repeats its last move for 4-8 turns.

name: Endure
description: The user will survive attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn with at least 1 HP. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and doubles each time this move is successfully used, up to a maximum of 8. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, or Protect. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

name: Explosion
description: The user faints after using this move, unless this move has no target. The target's Defense is halved during damage calculation. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
shortDescription: Target's Def halved during damage. User faints.

name: Extreme Speed
description: Usually goes first.
shortDescription: Usually goes first.

name: Feint
description: Fails unless the target is using Detect or Protect. If this move is successful, it breaks through the target's Detect or Protect for this turn, allowing other Pokemon to attack the target normally.
shortDescription: Breaks protection. Fails if target is not protecting.

name: Fire Fang
description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a 10% chance to make it flinch. This move can hit Pokemon with the Wonder Guard Ability regardless of their typing.

name: Fire Spin
description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns (always five turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass or U-turn. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 2-5 turns.

name: Flail
description: The power of this move is 20 if X is 43 to 48, 40 if X is 22 to 42, 80 if X is 13 to 21, 100 if X is 6 to 12, 150 if X is 2 to 5, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 64 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.

name: Flare Blitz
description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/3 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Has 1/3 recoil. 10% chance to burn. Thaws user.

name: Fling
description: The power of this move is based on the user's held item. The held item is lost and it activates for the target if applicable. If the target avoids this move by protecting itself, the user's held item is still lost. The user can regain a thrown item with Recycle. Fails if the user has no held item, if the held item cannot be thrown, or if the user is under the effect of Embargo.

name: Fly
description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Sky Uppercut, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it. If the user is holding a Power Herb, the move completes in one turn.

name: Focus Punch
description: The user loses its focus and does nothing if it is hit by a damaging attack this turn before it can execute the move, but it still loses PP.

name: Follow Me
description: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod or Storm Drain Abilities. This effect remains active even if the user leaves the field. Fails if it is not a Double Battle.

name: Foresight
description: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type.

name: Fury Attack
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.

name: Fury Cutter
description: Power doubles with each successful hit, up to a maximum of 160 power. The power is reset if this move misses or another move is used.
shortDescription: Power doubles with each hit, up to 160.

name: Fury Swipes
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.

name: Future Sight
description: Deals typeless damage that cannot be a critical hit two turns after this move is used. Damage is calculated against the target on use, and at the end of the final turn that damage is dealt to the Pokemon at the position the original target had at the time. Fails if this move or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position.

name: Giga Drain
description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded down.

name: Glare
description: Paralyzes the target.
shortDescription: Paralyzes the target.

name: Gravity
description: For 5 turns, the evasiveness of all active Pokemon is multiplied by 0.6. At the time of use, Bounce, Fly, and Magnet Rise end immediately for all active Pokemon. During the effect, Bounce, Fly, High Jump Kick, Jump Kick, Magnet Rise, and Splash are prevented from being used by all active Pokemon. Ground-type attacks, Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and the Arena Trap Ability can affect Flying types or Pokemon with the Levitate Ability. Fails if this move is already in effect.

name: Growth
description: Raises the user's Special Attack by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 1.

name: Gust
description: Power doubles if the target is using Bounce or Fly.
shortDescription: Power doubles during Bounce and Fly.

name: Hail
description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Hail. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are an Ice type or have the Ice Body, Magic Guard, or Snow Cloak Abilities. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Icy Rock. Fails if the current weather is Hail.

name: Head Smash
description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.

name: Heal Bell
description: Every Pokemon in the user's party is cured of its non-volatile status condition. Pokemon with the Soundproof Ability are not cured.

name: Heal Block
description: For 5 turns, the target is prevented from restoring any HP as long as it remains active. During the effect, healing moves are unusable, move effects that grant healing will not heal, but Abilities and items will continue to heal the user. If an affected Pokemon uses Baton Pass, the replacement will remain under the effect. Pain Split is unaffected.

name: Healing Wish
description: The user faints and the Pokemon brought out to replace it has its HP fully restored along with having any non-volatile status condition cured. The new Pokemon is sent out immediately and the healing happens after hazards take effect. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.

name: Heal Order
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down.

name: High Jump Kick
description: If this attack is not successful, the user loses HP equal to half the target's maximum HP if the target was immune, rounded down, otherwise half of the damage the target would have taken, rounded down, but no less than 1 HP and no more than half of the target's maximum HP, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
shortDescription: If miss, user takes 1/2 damage it would've dealt.

name: Icicle Spear
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.

name: Imprison
description: The user prevents all opposing Pokemon from using any moves that the user also knows as long as the user remains active. Fails if no opposing Pokemon know any of the user's moves.

name: Ingrain
description: The user has 1/16 of its maximum HP restored at the end of each turn, but it is prevented from switching out and other Pokemon cannot force the user to switch out. The user can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass or U-turn. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped and still receive the healing effect. During the effect, the user can be hit normally by Ground-type attacks and be affected by Spikes and Toxic Spikes, even if the user is a Flying type or has the Levitate Ability.

name: Jump Kick
description: If this attack is not successful, the user loses HP equal to half the target's maximum HP if the target was immune, rounded down, otherwise half of the damage the target would have taken, rounded down, but no less than 1 HP and no more than half of the target's maximum HP, as crash damage. Pokemon with the Magic Guard Ability are unaffected by crash damage.
shortDescription: If miss, user takes 1/2 damage it would've dealt.

name: Knock Off
description: The target's held item is lost for the rest of the battle, unless the item is a Griseous Orb or the target has the Multitype or Sticky Hold Abilities. During the effect, the target cannot obtain a new item by any means.
shortDescription: Target's item is lost and it cannot obtain another.

name: Last Resort
description: This move fails unless the user knows this move and at least one other move, and has used all the other moves it knows at least once each since it became active or Transformed.
shortDescription: Fails unless each known move has been used.

name: Leech Life
description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded down.

name: Light Screen
description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 1/2 damage from special attacks, or 2/3 damage if there are multiple active Pokemon on the user's side. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.

name: Lock-On
description: Until the end of the next turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. When this effect is started against the target, this and Mind Reader's effects end for every other Pokemon against that target. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement remains under this effect. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, this effect is restarted against the same target for the replacement. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field.

name: Lunar Dance
description: The user faints and the Pokemon brought out to replace it has its HP and PP fully restored along with having any non-volatile status condition cured. The new Pokemon is sent out immediately and the healing happens after hazards take effect. Fails if the user is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party.

name: Magic Coat
description: The user is unaffected by certain non-damaging moves directed at it and will instead use such moves against the original user. If the move targets both opposing Pokemon, the Pokemon under this effect will reflect the move only targeting the original user. The effect ends once a move is reflected or at the end of the turn. The Lightning Rod and Storm Drain Abilities redirect their respective moves before this move takes effect.

name: Magma Storm
description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns (always five turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass or U-turn. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 2-5 turns.

name: Magnet Rise
description: For 5 turns, the user is immune to Ground-type attacks and the effects of Spikes, Toxic Spikes, and the Arena Trap Ability as long as it remains active. If the user uses Baton Pass, the replacement will gain the effect. Ingrain and Iron Ball override this move if the user is under any of their effects. Fails if the user is already under this effect or the effect of Ingrain.

name: Magnitude
description: The power of this move varies. 5% chances for 10 and 150 power, 10% chances for 30 and 110 power, 20% chances for 50 and 90 power, and 30% chance for 70 power. Power doubles if the target is using Dig.

name: Mean Look
description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass or U-turn. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field, unless it uses Baton Pass, in which case the target will remain trapped.

name: Me First
description: The user uses the move the target chose for use this turn against it, if possible, with its power multiplied by 1.5. The move must be a damaging move other than Chatter, Counter, Covet, Focus Punch, Mirror Coat, or Thief. Fails if the target moves before the user. Ignores the target's substitute for the purpose of copying the move.

name: Mega Drain
description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down. If Big Root is held by the user, the HP recovered is 1.3x normal, rounded down.

name: Memento
description: Lowers the target's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. The user faints, even if this move misses. This move can hit targets in the middle of a two-turn move. Fails entirely if there is no target, but does not fail if the target's stats cannot be changed.

name: Metal Burst
description: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical or special attack this turn equal to 1.5 times the HP lost by the user from that attack, rounded down. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical or special attack this turn, or if the user did not lose HP from the attack.

name: Metronome
description: A random move is selected for use, other than Assist, Chatter, Copycat, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Endure, Feint, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Me First, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Protect, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Struggle, Switcheroo, Thief, or Trick.

name: Milk Drink
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down.

name: Mimic
description: While the user remains active, this move is replaced by the last move used by the target. The copied move has 5 PP. Fails if the target has not made a move, if the user has Transformed, if the user already knows the move, or if the move is Chatter, Metronome, Mimic, Sketch, or Struggle.

name: Mind Reader
description: Until the end of the next turn, the target cannot avoid the user's moves, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move. When this effect is started against the target, this and Lock-On's effects end for every other Pokemon against that target. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement remains under this effect. If the user leaves the field using Baton Pass, this effect is restarted against the same target for the replacement. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field.

name: Minimize
description: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1 stage. Whether or not the user's evasiveness was changed, Stomp will have its power doubled if used against the user while it is active.
shortDescription: Raises the user's evasiveness by 1.

name: Miracle Eye
description: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Psychic-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Dark type.

name: Mirror Coat
description: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a special attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. Only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's special attack this turn, or if the user did not lose HP from the attack.

name: Mirror Move
description: The user uses the last move that successfully targeted the user. The copied move is used with no specific target. Fails if no move has targeted the user, if the move was called by another move, if the move is Encore, or if the move cannot be copied by this move.

name: Moonlight
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded down.

name: Morning Sun
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded down.

name: Mud Sport
description: While the user is active, all Electric-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power halved. Fails if this effect is already active for the user. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.
shortDescription: Weakens Electric-type attacks to 1/2 their power.

name: Natural Gift
description: The type and power of this move depend on the user's held Berry, and the Berry is lost. Fails if the user is not holding a Berry, if the user has the Klutz Ability, or if Embargo is in effect for the user.

name: Nature Power
description: This move calls another move for use based on the battle terrain. Tri Attack in Wi-Fi battles.
shortDescription: Attack changes based on terrain. (Tri Attack)

name: Odor Sleuth
description: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it if it is greater than 0, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type.

name: Outrage
description: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused at the end of the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.

name: Payback
description: Power doubles if the user moves after the target this turn. Switching in counts as an action.

name: Petal Dance
description: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused at the end of the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.

name: Pin Missile
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.

name: Pluck
description: The user steals the target's held Berry if it is holding one and eats it immediately, gaining its effects unless the user's item is being ignored. Items lost to this move can be regained with Recycle.

name: Poison Gas
description: Poisons the target.
shortDescription: Poisons the foe(s).

name: Protect
description: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has a 1/X chance of being successful, where X starts at 1 and doubles each time this move is successfully used, up to a maximum of 8. X resets to 1 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, or Protect. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

name: Psywave
description: Deals damage to the target equal to (user's level) * (X * 10 + 50) / 100, where X is a random number from 0 to 10, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.

name: Pursuit
description: If an opposing Pokemon switches out this turn, this move hits that Pokemon before it leaves the field, even if it was not the original target. If the user moves after an opponent using U-turn, but not Baton Pass, it will hit that opponent before it leaves the field. Power doubles and no accuracy check is done if the user hits an opponent switching out, and the user's turn is over; if an opponent faints from this, the replacement Pokemon becomes active immediately.

name: Rapid Spin
description: If this move is successful, the effects of Leech Seed and binding moves end against the user, and all hazards are removed from the user's side of the field.

name: Razor Wind
description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second.

name: Recover
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down.

name: Recycle
description: The user regains the item last used by a Pokemon in its current position on the field, even if that Pokemon was not the user. Fails if the user is holding an item, if no items have been used at the user's position, or if the item was lost to Covet, Knock Off, or Thief. Items thrown with Fling can be regained.

name: Reflect
description: For 5 turns, the user and its party members take 1/2 damage from physical attacks, or 2/3 damage if there are multiple active Pokemon on the user's side. Critical hits ignore this effect. It is removed from the user's side if the user or an ally is successfully hit by Brick Break or Defog. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Light Clay. Fails if the effect is already active on the user's side.

name: Revenge
description: Power doubles if the user was hit by a Pokemon in the target's current position this turn.

name: Reversal
description: The power of this move is 20 if X is 43 to 48, 40 if X is 22 to 42, 80 if X is 13 to 21, 100 if X is 6 to 12, 150 if X is 2 to 5, and 200 if X is 0 or 1, where X is equal to (user's current HP * 64 / user's maximum HP), rounded down.

name: Roar
description: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability, or if the user's level is lower than the target's and X * (user's level + target's level) / 256 + 1 is less than or equal to (target's level / 4), rounded down, where X is a random number from 0 to 255.

name: Rock Blast
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.

name: Role Play
description: The user's Ability changes to match the target's Ability. Fails if the user's Ability is Multitype or already matches the target, if the target's Ability is Multitype or Wonder Guard, or if the user is holding a Griseous Orb.

name: Roost
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down. Until the end of the turn, Flying-type users lose their Flying type and pure Flying-type users become typeless. Does nothing if the user's HP is full.

name: Sandstorm
description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Sandstorm. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are a Ground, Rock, or Steel type, or have the Magic Guard or Sand Veil Abilities. During the effect, the Special Defense of Rock-type Pokemon is multiplied by 1.5 when taking damage from a special attack. Lasts for 8 turns if the user is holding Smooth Rock. Fails if the current weather is Sandstorm.

name: Sand Tomb
description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns (always five turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass or U-turn. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 2-5 turns.

name: Scary Face
description: Lowers the target's Speed by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's Speed by 2.

name: Secret Power
description: Has a 30% chance to cause a secondary effect on the target based on the battle terrain. Causes paralysis on the regular Wi-Fi terrain.
shortDescription: Effect varies with terrain. (30% paralysis chance)

name: Self-Destruct
description: The user faints after using this move, unless this move has no target. The target's Defense is halved during damage calculation. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.
shortDescription: Target's Def halved during damage. User faints.

name: Skill Swap
description: The user swaps its Ability with the target's Ability. Fails if either the user or the target's Ability is Multitype or Wonder Guard, if both have the same Ability, or if either is holding a Griseous Orb.

name: Sky Uppercut
description: This move can hit a target using Bounce or Fly.
shortDescription: Can hit Pokemon using Bounce or Fly.

name: Slack Off
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down.

name: Sleep Talk
description: One of the user's known moves, besides this move, is selected for use at random. Fails if the user is not asleep. The selected move does not have PP deducted from it, and can currently have 0 PP. This move cannot select Assist, Bide, Chatter, Copycat, Focus Punch, Me First, Metronome, Mirror Move, Sleep Talk, Uproar, or any two-turn move.

name: Smelling Salts
description: Power doubles if the target is paralyzed. If this move is successful, the target is cured of paralysis.

name: Snatch
description: If another Pokemon uses certain non-damaging moves this turn, the user steals that move to use itself. If multiple Pokemon use this move this turn, the applicable moves are stolen by each of those Pokemon in turn order, and only the last user in turn order will gain the effects.

name: Soft-Boiled
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down.

name: Solar Beam
description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. Damage is halved if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm. If the user is holding a Power Herb or the weather is Sunny Day, the move completes in one turn.

name: Spider Web
description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass or U-turn. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field, unless it uses Baton Pass, in which case the target will remain trapped.

name: Spike Cannon
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the user has the Skill Link Ability, this move will always hit five times. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.

name: Spit Up
description: Power is equal to 100 times the user's Stockpile count. This move does not apply damage variance. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. Unless there is no target, whether or not this move is successful the user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.

name: Stomp
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Power doubles if the target has used Minimize while active.

name: Submission
description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.

name: Sucker Punch
description: Fails if the target did not select a physical or special attack for use this turn, or if the target moves before the user.

name: Surf
description: Power doubles if the target is using Dive.
shortDescription: Hits adjacent Pokemon. Power doubles on Dive.

name: Swallow
description: The user restores its HP based on its Stockpile count. Restores 1/4 of its maximum HP if it's 1, 1/2 of its maximum HP if it's 2, both rounded down, and all of its HP if it's 3. Fails if the user's Stockpile count is 0. The user's Defense and Special Defense decrease by as many stages as Stockpile had increased them, and the user's Stockpile count resets to 0.

name: Switcheroo
description: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Griseous Orb, if neither is holding an item, if either has the Multitype Ability, if either is under the effect of Knock Off, or if the target has the Sticky Hold Ability.

name: Synthesis
description: The user restores 1/2 of its maximum HP if no weather conditions are in effect, 2/3 of its maximum HP if the weather is Sunny Day, and 1/4 of its maximum HP if the weather is Hail, Rain Dance, or Sandstorm, all rounded down.

name: Tackle
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Tail Glow
description: Raises the user's Special Attack by 2 stages.
shortDescription: Raises the user's Sp. Atk by 2.

name: Tailwind
description: For 3 turns, the user and its party members have their Speed doubled. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's side.
shortDescription: For 3 turns, allies' Speed is doubled.

name: Take Down
description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.

name: Taunt
description: For 3 to 5 turns, prevents the target from using non-damaging moves.
shortDescription: For 3-5 turns, the target can't use status moves.

name: Thief
description: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail or Griseous Orb, or if the target has the Multitype Ability. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle.

name: Thrash
description: The user spends two or three turns locked into this move and becomes confused at the end of the last turn of the effect if it is not already. This move targets an opposing Pokemon at random on each turn. If the user is prevented from moving, is asleep at the beginning of a turn, or the attack is not successful against the target, the effect ends without causing confusion. If this move is called by Sleep Talk, the move is used for one turn and does not confuse the user.

name: Thunder
description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This move can hit a target using Bounce or Fly. If the weather is Rain Dance, this move does not check accuracy. If the weather is Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is 50%.

name: Toxic
description: Badly poisons the target. If a Poison-type Pokemon uses this move, the target cannot avoid the attack, even if the target is in the middle of a two-turn move.
shortDescription: Badly poisons the target. Poison types can't miss.

name: Toxic Spikes
description: Sets up a hazard on the opposing side of the field, poisoning each opposing Pokemon that switches in, unless it is a Flying-type Pokemon or has the Levitate Ability. Can be used up to two times before failing. Opposing Pokemon become poisoned with one layer and badly poisoned with two layers. Can be removed from the opposing side if any opposing Pokemon uses Rapid Spin successfully, is hit by Defog, or a grounded Poison-type Pokemon switches in. Safeguard prevents the opposing party from being poisoned on switch-in, as well as switching in with a substitute.

name: Transform
description: The user transforms into the target. The target's current stats, stat stages, types, moves, Ability, weight, IVs, species, and sprite are copied. The user's level and HP remain the same and each copied move receives only 5 PP. This move fails if the target has transformed.

name: Trick
description: The user swaps its held item with the target's held item. Fails if either the user or the target is holding a Mail or Griseous Orb, if neither is holding an item, if either has the Multitype Ability, if either is under the effect of Knock Off, or if the target has the Sticky Hold Ability.

name: Trick Room
description: For 5 turns, all active Pokemon with lower Speed will move before those with higher Speed, within their priority brackets. If this move is used during the effect, the effect ends.

name: Triple Kick
description: Hits three times. Power increases to 20 for the second hit and 30 for the third. This move checks accuracy for each hit, and the attack ends if the target avoids a hit. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.

name: Twineedle
description: Hits twice, with each hit having a 20% chance to poison the target. If the first hit breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the second hit. If the target has a Focus Sash and had full HP when this move started, it will not be knocked out regardless of the number of hits.

name: Twister
description: Has a 20% chance to make the target flinch. Power doubles if the target is using Bounce or Fly.

name: U-turn
description: If this move is successful and the user has not fainted, the user switches out even if it is trapped and is replaced immediately by a selected party member. The user does not switch out if there are no unfainted party members.

name: Uproar
description: The user spends three to six turns locked into this move. This move targets an opponent at random on each turn. During effect, no active Pokemon can fall asleep by any means, and Pokemon that are already asleep wake up as their turn starts or at the end of each turn, including the last one. If the user is prevented from moving or the attack is not successful against the target during one of the turns, the effect ends.
shortDescription: Lasts 3-6 turns. Active Pokemon cannot sleep.

name: Volt Tackle
description: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target. If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/3 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Has 1/3 recoil. 10% chance to paralyze target.

name: Wake-Up Slap
description: Power doubles if the target is asleep. If this move is successful, the target wakes up.

name: Water Sport
description: While the user is active, all Fire-type attacks used by any active Pokemon have their power halved. Fails if this effect is already active for the user. Baton Pass can be used to transfer this effect to an ally.
shortDescription: Weakens Fire-type attacks to 1/2 their power.

name: Whirlpool
description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns (always five turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass or U-turn. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 2-5 turns.

name: Whirlwind
description: The target is forced to switch out and be replaced with a random unfainted ally. Fails if the target is the last unfainted Pokemon in its party, if the target used Ingrain previously or has the Suction Cups Ability, or if the user's level is lower than the target's and X * (user's level + target's level) / 256 + 1 is less than or equal to (target's level / 4), rounded down, where X is a random number from 0 to 255.

name: Wish
description: At the end of the next turn, the Pokemon at the user's position has 1/2 of its maximum HP restored to it, rounded down. Fails if this move is already in effect for the user's position.
shortDescription: Next turn, heals 50% of the recipient's max HP.

name: Wood Hammer
description: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 1/3 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.
shortDescription: Has 1/3 recoil.

name: Worry Seed
description: Causes the target's Ability to become Insomnia. Fails if the target's Ability is Multitype or Truant, or if the target is holding a Griseous Orb.

name: Wrap
description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns (always five turns if the user is holding Grip Claw). Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it is holding Shed Shell or uses Baton Pass or U-turn. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.
shortDescription: Traps and damages the target for 2-5 turns.

name: Wring Out
description: Power is equal to 120 * (target's current HP / target's maximum HP) + 1, rounded down.

name: Absorb
description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down.

name: Acid
description: Has a 10% chance to lower the target's Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 10% chance to lower the foe(s) Defense by 1.

name: Aeroblast
description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
shortDescription: High critical hit ratio.

name: Air Cutter
description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
shortDescription: High critical hit ratio. Hits adjacent foes.

name: Ancient Power
description: Has a 10% chance to raise the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 10% chance to raise all stats by 1 (not acc/eva).

name: Arm Thrust
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

name: Assist
description: A random move among those known by the user's party members is selected for use. Does not select Assist, Counter, Covet, Destiny Bond, Detect, Endure, Focus Punch, Follow Me, Helping Hand, Metronome, Mimic, Mirror Coat, Mirror Move, Protect, Sketch, Sleep Talk, Snatch, Struggle, Thief, or Trick.

name: Astonish
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch. Damage doubles if the target has used Minimize while active.

name: Barrage
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

name: Beat Up
description: Deals typeless damage. Hits one time for each unfainted Pokemon without a non-volatile status condition in the user's party, or fails if no Pokemon meet the criteria. For each hit, the damage formula uses the participating Pokemon's base Attack as the Attack stat, the target's base Defense as the Defense stat, and ignores stat stages and other effects that modify Attack or Defense; each hit is considered to come from the user.

name: Bide
description: The user spends two turns locked into this move and then, on the second turn after using this move, the user attacks the last Pokemon that hit it, inflicting double the damage in HP it lost during the two turns. If the last Pokemon that hit it is no longer active, the user attacks a random opposing Pokemon instead. If the user is prevented from moving during this move's use, the effect ends. This move does not ignore type immunity.

name: Bind
description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.

name: Bite
description: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.
shortDescription: 30% chance to make the target flinch.

name: Blaze Kick
description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target and a higher chance for a critical hit.
shortDescription: High critical hit ratio. 10% chance to burn.

name: Blizzard
description: Has a 10% chance to freeze the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to freeze foe(s).

name: Block
description: Prevents the target from switching out. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. If the target leaves the field using Baton Pass, the replacement will remain trapped. The effect ends if the user leaves the field, unless it uses Baton Pass, in which case the target will remain trapped.

name: Bone Rush
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

name: Bounce
description: Has a 30% chance to paralyze the target. This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Sky Uppercut, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it.

name: Brick Break
description: If this attack does not miss and whether or not the target is immune, the effects of Reflect and Light Screen end for the opponent's side of the field before damage is calculated.

name: Bullet Seed
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

name: Camouflage
description: The user's type changes based on the battle terrain. Normal type on the regular Wi-Fi terrain. Fails if the type is one of the user's current types.

name: Charge
description: If the user uses an Electric-type attack on the next turn, its power will be doubled.
shortDescription: The user's Electric attack next turn has 2x power.

name: Clamp
description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.

name: Comet Punch
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

name: Conversion
description: The user's type changes to match the original type of one of its known moves besides Curse, at random, but not either of its current types. Fails if the user cannot change its type, or if this move would only be able to select one of the user's current types.

name: Conversion 2
description: The user's type changes to match a type that resists or is immune to the type of the last move used against the user, if it was successful against the user, but not either of its current types. The determined type of the move is used rather than the original type, but considers Struggle as Normal. Fails if the last move used against the user was not successful, or if this move would only be able to select one of the user's current types.

name: Counter
description: Deals damage to the last opposing Pokemon to hit the user with a physical attack this turn equal to twice the HP lost by the user from that attack. If that opposing Pokemon's position is no longer in use and there is another opposing Pokemon on the field, the damage is done to it instead. This move considers Hidden Power as Normal type, and only the last hit of a multi-hit attack is counted. Fails if the user was not hit by an opposing Pokemon's physical attack this turn, or if the user did not lose HP from the attack.

name: Covet
description: If this attack was successful and the user has not fainted, it steals the target's held item if the user is not holding one. The target's item is not stolen if it is a Mail or Enigma Berry. Items lost to this move cannot be regained with Recycle.

name: Crabhammer
description: Has a higher chance for a critical hit.
shortDescription: High critical hit ratio.

name: Crunch
description: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.
shortDescription: 20% chance to lower the target's Sp. Def by 1.

name: Curse
description: If the user is not a Ghost type, lowers the user's Speed by 1 stage and raises the user's Attack and Defense by 1 stage. If the user is a Ghost type, the user loses 1/2 of its maximum HP, rounded down and even if it would cause fainting, in exchange for the target losing 1/4 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn while it is active. If the target uses Baton Pass, the replacement will continue to be affected. Fails if there is no target or if the target is already affected.
shortDescription: Curses if Ghost, else -1 Spe, +1 Atk, +1 Def.

name: Detect
description: The user is protected from most attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn. This move has an X/65536 chance of being successful, where X starts at 65535 and halves, rounded down, each time this move is successfully used. After the fourth successful use in a row, X drops to 118 and continues with seemingly random values from 0-65535 on subsequent successful uses. X resets to 65535 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, or Protect. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

name: Dig
description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Earthquake and Magnitude, which have doubled power when used against it, and is also unaffected by weather.

name: Disable
description: For 2 to 5 turns, the target's last move used becomes disabled. Fails if one of the target's moves is already disabled, if the target has not made a move, if the target no longer knows the move, or if the move has 0 PP.
shortDescription: For 2-5 turns, disables the target's last move.

name: Dive
description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Surf and Whirlpool, which have doubled power when used against it, and is also unaffected by weather.

name: Doom Desire
description: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Future Sight is already in effect for the target's position.
shortDescription: Hits two turns after being used.

name: Double Slap
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

name: Dragon Claw
description: No additional effect.
shortDescription: No additional effect.

name: Dream Eater
description: The target is unaffected by this move unless it is asleep and does not have a substitute. The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down, but not less than 1 HP.

name: Encore
description: For 3 to 6 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used. If the affected move runs out of PP, the effect ends. Fails if the target is already under this effect, if it has not made a move, if the move has 0 PP, or if the move is Encore, Mimic, Mirror Move, Sketch, Struggle, or Transform.
shortDescription: The target repeats its last move for 3-6 turns.

name: Endure
description: The user will survive attacks made by other Pokemon during this turn with at least 1 HP. This move has an X/65536 chance of being successful, where X starts at 65535 and halves, rounded down, each time this move is successfully used. After the fourth successful use in a row, X drops to 118 and continues with seemingly random values from 0-65535 on subsequent successful uses. X resets to 65535 if this move fails or if the user's last move used is not Detect, Endure, or Protect. Fails if the user moves last this turn.

name: Explosion
description: The user faints after using this move. The target's Defense is halved during damage calculation. This move is prevented from executing if any active Pokemon has the Damp Ability.

name: Extrasensory
description: Has a 10% chance to make the target flinch. Damage doubles if the target has used Minimize while active.

name: Feint Attack
description: This move does not check accuracy.
shortDescription: This move does not check accuracy.

name: Fire Punch
description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to burn the target.

name: Fire Spin
description: Prevents the target from switching for two to five turns. Causes damage to the target equal to 1/16 of its maximum HP, rounded down, at the end of each turn during effect. The target can still switch out if it uses Baton Pass. The effect ends if either the user or the target leaves the field, or if the target uses Rapid Spin or Substitute successfully. This effect is not stackable or reset by using this or another binding move.

name: Flame Wheel
description: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
shortDescription: 10% chance to burn the target. Thaws user.

name: Flash
description: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1 stage.
shortDescription: Lowers the target's accuracy by 1.

name: Fly
description: This attack charges on the first turn and executes on the second. On the first turn, the user avoids all attacks other than Gust, Sky Uppercut, Thunder, and Twister, and Gust and Twister have doubled power when used against it.

name: Follow Me
description: Until the end of the turn, all single-target attacks from the opposing side are redirected to the user. Such attacks are redirected to the user before they can be reflected by Magic Coat, or drawn in by the Lightning Rod Ability. This effect remains active even if the user leaves the field. Fails if it is not a Double Battle.

name: Foresight
description: As long as the target remains active, its evasiveness stat stage is ignored during accuracy checks against it, and Normal- and Fighting-type attacks can hit the target if it is a Ghost type.

name: Fury Attack
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

name: Fury Swipes
description: Hits two to five times. Has a 3/8 chance to hit two or three times, and a 1/8 chance to hit four or five times. If one of the hits breaks the target's substitute, it will take damage for the remaining hits.

name: Future Sight
description: Deals damage two turns after this move is used. At the end of that turn, the damage is calculated at that time and dealt to the Pokemon at the position the target had when the move was used. If the user is no longer active at the time, damage is calculated based on the user's natural Special Attack stat, types, and level, with no boosts from its held item or Ability. Fails if this move or Doom Desire is already in effect for the target's position.
shortDescription: Hits two turns after being used.

name: Giga Drain
description: The user recovers 1/2 the HP lost by the target, rounded down.

name: Glare
description: Paralyzes the target. This move does not ignore type immunity.

name: Growth
description: Raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage. If the weather is Sunny Day or Desolate Land, this move raises the user's Attack and Special Attack by 2 stages. If the user is holding Utility Umbrella, this move will only raise the user's Attack and Special Attack by 1 stage, even if the weather is Sunny Day or Desolate Land.
shortDescription: Raises user's Attack and Sp. Atk by 1; 2 in Sun.

name: Gust
description: Power doubles if the target is using Bounce, Fly, or Sky Drop, or is under the effect of Sky Drop.
shortDescription: Power doubles during Bounce, Fly, and Sky Drop.

name: Hail
description: For 5 turns, the weather becomes Hail. At the end of each turn except the last, all active Pokemon lose 1/16 of their maximum HP, rounded down, unless they are an Ice type. Fails if the current weather is Hail.

name: Hidden Power
description: This move's type depends on the user's individual values (IVs), and can be any type but Fairy and Normal.
shortDescription: Varies in type based on the user's IVs.

name: High Jump Kick
description: If this attack is not successful and the target was not immune, the user loses HP equal to half of the damage the target would have taken, rounded down, but no less than 1 HP and no more than half of the target's maximum HP, as crash damage.
shortDescription: If miss, user takes 1/2 damage it would've dealt.

name: Hyper Beam
description: If this move is successful, the user must recharge on the following turn and cannot select a move.
shortDescription: User cannot move next turn.

name: Hyper Voice
description: No additional effect.
